column4: I have owned a number of security cameras and this one is the best.
column5: I have owned a number of security cameras and this one is the best. Set up within minutes and the preset function is brilliant. The speed of the camera panning is the best. You wont be disappointed with your purchase. Features secure wireless WPA / WPA2 AES Encryption (2.4ghz networks only); Complicated camera ID and default password change required for the access safety. all cameras CE, FCC, RoHs, TELEC certified with UL compliant. After extensively research on IP camera market, Our team realized that the setup process and Wi-Fi connection stability may be pains for most of users. To address these issues, Our App SotionCam simplifies the setup process in one page. The setup wizard is clearly instructed. You just plug in the cable, scan the QR code to acquire camera ID, select a network and input the network password. The camera will not lose Wi-Fi connection after you set it up. The user manual is built-in to the App. No registration is required. Just download and install it, and you are ready to use. You may find the answers to all your questions in the App.

column4: Excellent value for price and night vision is nice
column5: Excellent value for price... easy set up the camera and i can monitor my home from my iPhone easily. Still early days to provide a review about all features, but so far it has been a great tool. The night vision is really really good. This monitor camera super clear night vision up to 30 feet. Intelligent motion detection alarm/alert and video recording for your home/business security; support real time video recording and micro SD card recording; playback the images captured and video recorded on the App or PC anytime. User may have concerns about the security to use such internet camera. The most probable reasons may be due to simple camera ID and using of default password without change. App SotionCam improve the security significantly. The complicated camera ID is up to 24 characters, including letters and numbers. The App will keep reminding you of changing the default password until you have changed it. Lovely little security camera, good clear picture. It’s nice to have peace of mind that your house is being watched.

column4: Good value, easy to set up, and so far no problems.
column5: Good value, easy to set up, and so far no problems. The speed of the pan-tilt function is a bit high, and the microphone seems to only pick up fairly loud sounds, the quality of the picture, particularly in low light, is much better than my previous (more expensive) IP camera. Overall, very happy with the product for the price paid. Really happy with the purchase for the price it’s clear you can talk through it listen and adjust the camera view on your phone. Great little thing! Only thing is you do hear a regular blip when listening but you get used to it being the camera and not your pet! Super HD remote live video streaming, pan (355º), tilt (110º) and digital zoom (5x) via smart phone, tablet, PC and Mac. Typically used as Baby Monitor, Pet Monitor, Elderly Monitor, Home Security Monitor, Business surveillance and etc. Camera works well once set up, no issues connecting to phone or tablet and the image quality is good - considering the price IP camera would be hard to beat. Also works better than expected at night.

column4: Absolutely brilliant monitor camera control through the free App.
column5: This is a great wireless security camera,very clear. I get help setting it up but didn't take long.3 of my friends are buying this product. great value for money. Great and can have many accounts to access, mum can watch dad, dad can watch mum. Easy to control through Application. You can either record video and save on SD card any time or record live video and take snapshot when you are on live feed (SD card not required). You can also download videos from SD card to the App. For SD card recording, you can schedule time to record or when the alarm is on. Easy to setup, provided you set up your router correctly. Both day-time and night-time images are as good as can be expected. The alerts work well and I’m pleased I bought this.For the price I can’t find any faults with this camera. This monitor camera coverage is excellent and the night vision too. Price was extremely good value even without the lightening deal. Definitely recommend it.

column4: Fabulous foot massager at an excellent price
column5: I love to use foot massager for plantar fasciitis on a walking day. It can ease the soreness of my feet. It's very good and fantasy footies massager, never have any one better than this. Fabulous foot massager machine. I use it when watching my daily fix of soaps. Has really helped with my foot cramps too. I am pleased with my purchase and would buy again. Highly recommend.
